title: HTML Tags
description: Tags are the building blocks of HTML. Each tag tells the browser how to display the content.

sections.heading: What is a Tag?
sections.content:
An HTML tag is a keyword enclosed in angle brackets. Tags usually come in pairs like

and

— an opening tag and a closing tag.

sections.heading: Common Tags
sections.content: Below are some of the most common HTML tags you’ll use when building a web page.
